body.name: Retro Game Console, Plug and Play Video Game Stick Built in 20000+ Games,23 Classic Emulators, 4K High Definition HDMI Output for TV with Dual Controllers
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 44 mins
features: 【Built-in 20000+ Retro Games】This TV game console built in 20000+ rich games, is pre-install 23 emulators, and pack with 64GB TF card. No need to download and install by yourself, no internet required, you can play 20000+ classic games just by connecting to the TV. Let you play games without repetition every day and bring back your memory to the fun of childhood,enjoy family entertainment time！

【2 Controllers,Support 2 Players Play】This retro handheld game console with built in games comes with 2 PCS game controllers, connection between game controller and game stick, no road restrictions, more fun.

【HDMI Output】Enjoy retro video game on a big TV screen by using the mini HDMI cable connect to the TV. This video game console support high definition HDMI output ,please make sure your screen has an HDMI input port. The TV game console can connect to TV/TV Set-top Box/PC/Laptop/Projector.

【Easy Operated】Just connect the game stick to the power source, then plug to the TV, and adjust the TV source to the HD channel to display the game list screen on the TV. The specific steps are as follows: 1. Connect the HD output of the TV first 2. Insert the built-in TF game content card 3. Using the charging adapter to connect to the power will automatically turn on. (2 controllers need to install 4 AAA batteries, not included in package).

【Perfect Gift for Kids & Adults】 The handheld video game not only bringing funny game time to children but also waking up wonderful childhood memories to the 80s and 90s adults, as well as releasing their life pressure. Ideal gift for kids and adults on birthday or any occasion. Enjoy your parent-child time and it would be fun for the whole family！
body.description: High-quality 4K output: This game console is suitable for 4K ultra-high-definition TV/computer/monitor/projector, supports HDMI connection (non-AV output), has 1080P high-definition picture quality, and can enjoy lively and interesting video games on the big screen！

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.2 3.2 out of 5 stars 19 ratings 3.2 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for a game console with all the old games on it that actually works then get this one. I purchased a different one and had to return it because it was junk. This one actually works and has a ton of games on it. Some of them are repeats and some in foreign language so if you find one and it doesn't work for you keep searching. Chances are it is loaded under a different area. It does come with two controllers and it's easy to install. You just plug it into your TV and your ready to play!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The games are not clear at all they are blurry not good Bad product y won't buy this for a dollar bad, bad product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Some games don’t work
reviews.reviewText: It does not have the old games I’m looking for despite of wide variety it has. Some games don’t work. The controller buttons are a tad too wide compared to the popular game console ones. Too bad, I really want to like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Back up the Micro SD card
reviews.reviewText: This item worked just fine. It is called M15 Plus. I bought an M15 elsewhere, that came with a defective MicroSD card, so I recommend to backup an image of the SD card, first thing, that way if it goes bad, you can flash another.I used the backup to fix the broken one.Also, if you can’t find the coin button, or the start, use the other controller. One of the is the main controller.
